settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.apiSettingsDescription: Configure your OpenRouter API Key and preferred model for AI-powered financial tips. Get an API key from OpenRouter.ai. Settings are stored locally in your browser.
settingsPage.apiKeyHelp: Leave blank and save to remove the key.
settingsPage.modelNameHelp: Enter the full model name from OpenRouter (e.g., `anthropic/claude-3-haiku-20240307`). If left empty, "{defaultModel}" will be used by default for AI tips.
settingsPage.ocrModelNameLabel: OCR AI Model Name (for Bill Scan)
settingsPage.ocrModelNameHelp: Enter model for OCR enhancement (e.g., '{defaultModel}'). If empty, defaults to a specific OCR model or the financial tip model.
settingsPage.apiKeyRemovedMessage: API Key removed. Model configuration updated.
settingsPage.failureMessage: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
settingsPage.settingsUsageInfo: ClarityLedger uses your OpenRouter key and specified models to provide AI features.
settingsPage.exportCsvErrorMessage: Failed to export transactions to CSV. Please try again.
settingsPage.importConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to import data? This will replace ALL current transactions. This action cannot be undone.
settingsPage.importConfirmMessageFull: Are you sure you want to import data? This will replace ALL current transactions, budgets, recurring transaction templates, and application settings (API key, AI model, language, theme, currency, custom categories). This action cannot be undone.
settingsPage.exportSuccessMessageFull: All data (transactions, budgets, settings, recurring templates) exported as {filename}!
settingsPage.exportErrorMessage: Failed to export data. Please try again.
settingsPage.importSuccessInfoNavigate: Navigate to the Dashboard to see the changes.
settingsPage.importSuccessInfoReload: Please refresh the page for all settings to take full effect.
settingsPage.importErrorMessageFile: Failed to read file or invalid file type. Please select a valid JSON backup file.
settingsPage.importErrorMessageFormat: Invalid JSON format in backup file. Please check the file content.
settingsPage.importErrorMessageValidation: Invalid data structure in backup file.
settingsPage.importInvalidDataSubText: The backup file is not in the expected format or is corrupted. Please ensure you are using a valid ClarityLedger backup file.

customCategories.title: Category Management
customCategories.description: Manage your custom income and expense categories. Default categories cannot be deleted.
customCategories.errorIsDefault: Category '{categoryName}' is a default category and cannot be added as custom.
customCategories.errorCannotDeleteDefault: Default categories cannot be deleted here.
customCategories.confirmDeleteInUse: Category '{categoryName}' is currently in use by some transactions. Deleting it will remove it from the selection list. Are you sure?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Your financial data is stored locally in your browser's storage (LocalStorage). It is not sent to any external server, ensuring your privacy.
faq.a2: Yes, ClarityLedger is designed as a Progressive Web App (PWA) and can work offline once it has been loaded in your browser.
faq.q3: How do I backup my data?
faq.a3: You can export all your data, including transactions, budgets, recurring transaction templates, and settings, as a JSON file from the 'Data Management' section on the Settings page. You can also import this data back into the app.
faq.q4: Are the AI Financial Tips free?
faq.a4: ClarityLedger uses the OpenRouter API to provide AI tips. OpenRouter offers access to various AI models, some ofwhich may have free tiers or require credits. You need to provide your own OpenRouter API key in the Settings. Please check OpenRouter's pricing and terms.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started Guide
gettingStarted.s1: Navigate to the Dashboard to view your financial overview, including income, expenses, and balance summaries.
gettingStarted.s2: Use the 'Add Transaction' button on the Dashboard to record your income and expenses. Be sure to select the correct type and category.
gettingStarted.s3: Set monthly budgets for different expense categories in the 'Monthly Budgets' section on the Dashboard to track your spending goals. You can enable 'rollover' for budgets to carry over surplus/deficit to the next month.
gettingStarted.s4: Manage recurring income and expenses in the 'Recurring' section to automate transaction entries.
gettingStarted.s5: Visit the Settings page to configure your OpenRouter API key for AI financial tips, manage custom transaction categories, choose your preferred language and theme, and manage your application data (export/import).

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.p1: {appName} is a locally-run application designed for personal use. Your data remains on your device.
contact.p2: For general questions, please consult the FAQs above. If you encounter technical issues or have suggestions, you can (hypothetically) visit the project's GitHub page or community forum if one exists.

aiFinancialTip.title: AI Financial Tip
aiFinancialTip.initialMessage: Click "Get New Tip" for personalized advice!
aiFinancialTip.infoText: AI-generated tips are for informational purposes only. Powered by OpenRouter.
aiFinancialTip.errorApiKeyNotSet: Could not fetch a tip: OpenRouter API Key is not set. Please configure it in the Settings page.
aiFinancialTip.errorInvalidApiKey: Could not fetch a tip: Invalid OpenRouter API Key. Please check it in the Settings page.
aiFinancialTip.errorRateLimit: Could not fetch a tip: Rate limit exceeded or quota finished for OpenRouter (model: {model}). Please check your OpenRouter account.
aiFinancialTip.errorDefault: Sorry, I couldn't fetch a financial tip right now. {message}
aiFinancialTip.errorUnexpectedResponse: Sorry, I received an unexpected response structure from the AI service while fetching a tip.
aiFinancialTip.errorNoChoices: Sorry, the AI model returned no choices. This might be due to content filters, model settings, or an issue with the model. Please try a different model or prompt.
aiFinancialTip.errorEmptyMessage: Sorry, the AI model returned an empty message. Please try again or a different model.
aiFinancialTip.errorGenericNetwork: Sorry, I couldn't fetch a financial tip right now due to a network or client-side issue. Please try again later.
